name: Mr. Hibbl
description:
Accompany Mr. Hibbl on his exciting adventure and explore with him 27 action-packed levels full of traps and adversaries.



Enjoy the colorful pixel graphics accompanied by atmospheric music and help Mr. Hibbl to the exits of each level in order to regain all lost treasures.

On this journey through an exciting platform adventure, you can unlock up to 100 Steam achievements while your skills are constantly being tested.
